title: Ebola At Eye Level: Looking At The Outbreak In Sierra Leone
teaser: Dr. Suzanne Donovan recently returned from a trip to Sierra Leone, working with the WHO on its Ebola response. NPR's Arun Rath talks with Donovan about her on-the-ground view of the Ebola outbreak.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
